content: {"name": "Cumberland County Meals on Wheels Program", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The program provides a hot, well-planned, nutritionally balanced meal Monday through Friday, delivered to the home of those elderly who cannot prepare or procure a hot meal. Low sodium and diabetic meals are provided when prescribed by a physician. In addition, the program provides weekend meals to those clients in need of the service. Recipients may live anywhere within the boundaries of Cumberland County and must be sixty years of age or older.\n\nFurther information may be obtained by contacting Morgan Bishop, Nutrition Programs for the Elderly Director at (856) 453-2159.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cumberlandcountynj.gov/aging/mow", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "164 West Broad Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Bridgeton", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.4284965, "longitude": -75.24275589999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 453-2159", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}]}
